Openness To Feedback.assessmentDescription: With this life approach, I seek and receive feedback from all those around me. I do this because I know this feedback will propel me forward to reach my personal and team goals.

scoringContext.description: Pays little or no attention to teammatesâ€™ suggestions or contributions. * Often defensive when receiving feedback (especially negative feedback).
Willing to accept feedback, but often shy or timid to consult other. * Does not willingly invite/request opinions from teammates
Quick to admit areas of weakness; seeks help promptly, when it is necessary. * Acknowledges and appreciates both positive and negative feedback

Progress Attempts.assessmentDescription: With this life approach, I harness the power of reflection and action after receiving feedback. I do this to push my learning into action and bring about observable changes in my day-to-day way of being.

scoringContext.description: Does not evaluate or reflect on feedback given to identify any inherent value/benefit. * Reflections often surface-level, showing little or no intention/commitment to apply feedback given
Considers feedback valuable, but does not seek additional clarification. * Shows willingness to incorporate the feedback, but does not provide a plan of intended action(s)
Reflects on feedback and asks additional questions for clarification. * Responds with an articulate plan (verbal or written) showing commitment to apply the feedback, taking noticeable action(s).
